name: A love story
description:
**** IMPORTANT ****

So if you're stuck anywhere, here's a little guide: In the well, you much grab and punch the character. In the room with a basket, You have to ding the bell in the back and when he's not looking, try to pick the basket up and then release it.

We were going to add emotions to the characters in the cutscenes but ran out of time¯\_(ツ)_/¯ sorry
